item.title: Archana add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Archana add a quote by Lisa See
item.description: "I’ve never thought much about whether I was happy or if I had fun as a child. I was a so-so girl who lived with a so-so family in a so-so village. I didn’t know that there might be another way to live, and I didn’t worry about it either." -- Lisa See

item.title: Archana add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Archana add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Archana add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Go to heaven for the climate and hell for the company." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Archana add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "I can't go back to yesterday because I was a different person then." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Archana add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Mockingbirds don’t do one thing but make music for us to enjoy. They don’t eat up people’s gardens, don’t nest in corncribs, they don’t do one thing but sing their hearts out for us. That’s why it’s a sin to kill a mockingbird." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Archana add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Sometimes when I'm talking, my words can't keep up with my thoughts. I wonder why we think faster than we speak. Probably so we can think twice." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Archana add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Have you ever noticed that anybody driving slower than you is an idiot, and anyone going faster than you is a maniac?" -- George Carlin

item.title: Archana add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I have great faith in fools - self-confidence my friends will call it." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Archana add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Archana add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Some people claim that marriage interferes with romance. There's no doubt about it. Anytime you have a romance, your wife is bound to interfere." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Archana add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Archana add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Archana add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Cultivate your curves - they may be dangerous but they won't be avoided." -- Mae West

item.title: Archana add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "I think the key indicator for wealth is not good grades, work ethic, or IQ. I believe it's relationships. Ask yourself two questions: How many people do I know, and how much ransom money could I get for each one?" -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Archana add a quote by Lauren Myracle
item.description: "I live in my own little world. But its ok, they know me here." -- Lauren Myracle

item.title: Archana add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Men marry women with the hope they will never change. Women marry men with the hope they will change. Invariably they are both disappointed." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Archana add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "When two people are under the influence of the most violent, most insane, most delusive, and most transient of passions, they are required to swear that they will remain in that excited, abnormal, and exhausting condition continuously until death do them part." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Archana add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "Sometimes I wonder if men and women really suit each other. Perhaps they should live next door and just visit now and then." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Archana add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Someone told me the delightful story of the crusader who put a chastity belt on his wife and gave the key to his best friend for safekeeping, in case of his death. He had ridden only a few miles away when his friend, riding hard, caught up with him, saying 'You gave me the wrong key!" -- Anais Nin

item.title: Archana add a quote by Socrates
item.description: "By all means marry; if you get a good wife, you’ll become happy; if you get a bad one, you’ll become a philosopher." -- Socrates

item.title: Archana add a quote by Gemma Hatchback
item.description: "If a man is highly sexed he's virile. If a woman is, she's a nymphomaniac. With them it's power but with us it's a disease! Even the act of sex is called penetration! Why don't they call it enclosure?" -- Gemma Hatchback

item.title: Archana add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Dancing is a perpendicular expression of a horizontal desire." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Archana add a quote by Robert Byrne
item.description: "Anybody who believes that the way to a man's heart is through his stomach flunked geography. " -- Robert Byrne

item.title: Archana add a quote by Peter Kreeft
item.description: "America does not know the difference between money and sex. It treats sex like money because it treats sex as a medium of exchange, and it treats money like sex because it expects its money to get pregnant and reproduce." -- Peter Kreeft

item.title: Archana add a quote by R.D. Laing
item.description: "Life is a sexually transmitted disease and the mortality rate is one hundred percent." -- R.D. Laing

item.title: Archana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Every blessing ignored becomes a curse." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Archana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "To realize one's destiny is a person's only obligation." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Archana add a quote by William Ralph Inge
item.description: "It is useless for the sheep to pass resolutions in favor of vegetarianism, while the wolf remains of a different opinion." -- William Ralph Inge
